api-errors-messages.bad-request: The data entered was not in the correct format.

campaign-creation.external-user-id-required: Please specify the type of external user ID which the participants will be required to fill when starting the customised test.
campaign-creation.purpose-required: Please select the purpose of your campaign: assess participants or collect their profiles.
campaign-creation.target-profile-required: Please select a target profile for your campaign.

api-errors-messages.default: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

edit-student-number.student-number-exists: The student number entered is already used by {firstName} {lastName}

api-errors-messages.global: An error occurred. Please try again later.

student-csv-import.bad-csv-format: The file must be in csv format with comma or semicolon separator.
student-csv-import.field-date-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be in the format dd/mm/yyyy.
student-csv-import.field-email-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be a valid email address.
student-csv-import.field-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-max-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain less than {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.field-min-length: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must contain at least {limit} characters.
student-csv-import.header-unknown: Column headers must be identical to the ones on the template.
student-csv-import.identifier-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” of this row is repeated several times within the file.
student-csv-import.insee-code-invalid: Row {line} : The field “{field}” is not in the INSEE format.
student-csv-import.payload-too-large: The file must be less than {maxSize}MB.
student-csv-import.student-number-format: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must not contain any special characters.
student-csv-import.student-number-unique: Row {line} : The field “{field}” must be unique within the file.

student-xml-import.empty: Each student must have an INE and a class.
student-xml-import.ine-required: INE is mandatory for each student.
student-xml-import.ine-unique: The INE {nationalStudentId} is repeated several times within the file for several students.
student-xml-import.invalid-file: File does not match the requirements.
student-xml-import.payload-too-large: The file must be less than {maxSize}MB.
student-xml-import.uai-mismatched: The UAI of your SIECLE file does not match your school.

campaigns.message: Don't forget to create your back-to-school campaigns and share the codes with your students before November. More info for '<'a href={middleSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'middle schools {faIcon}'' and '<'a href={highSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'high schools {faIcon}''

import.link-to: import or reimport the students database
import.message: Start of school year: the ''admin'' must {linkTo} to start using Pix Orga. Learn more on '<'a href={middleSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'middle schools {faIcon}'' and '<'a href={highSchoolDocumentationLink} class={externalLinkClasses} target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"'>'high schools {faIcon}''

participants-average-results.information: Find here the average results of your campaign. This includes all the participants who have completed their customised test and sent their results.
participants-average-results.title: Average result

participants-average-stages.information: Find here the average rating of your campaign. This includes all the participants who have completed their customised test and sent their results.
participants-average-stages.title: Average rating

participants-count.information: Find here the total number of participations in your campaign. This includes all the participants who have entered the code and started their customised test or submitted their profile.
participants-count.title: Total participants

submitted-count.information: Find here the results submitted by your participants. This includes all the participants who have finished and clicked on the button "Submit my results" or "Submit my profile".
submitted-count.title: Submitted results

participants-by-mastery-percentage.loader: Loading participants grouped by success rates
participants-by-mastery-percentage.title: Distribution of participants grouped by success rate

labels-a11y.started: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} in progress
labels-a11y.completed: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with pending results
labels-a11y.shared: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with submitted results
labels-a11y.shared-profile: {count, plural, =0 {0 participants} =1 {1 participant} other {{count, number} participants}} with submitted profiles

labels-legend.started-tooltip: In progress: These participants haven’t finished their customised test yet.
labels-legend.completed-assessment-tooltip: Pending results: These participants have finished their customised test but haven’t submitted their results yet.
labels-legend.completed-profile-tooltip: Pending profiles: These participants haven’t submitted their profiles yet.
labels-legend.shared-tooltip: Submitted results: These participants have finished their customised test and submitted their results.
labels-legend.shared-profile-tooltip: Submitted profiles: These participants have submitted their profiles.

campaign.empty-state: No participants yet! Share with them the following link to join this campaign.

external-id-label.label: external user ID label
external-id-label.question-label: Do you need an external user ID?

landing-page-text.label: Text to display on the starting page

campaign-creation.legal-warning: *In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), and as data controller, please be careful not to ask for significant or identifying personal data unless it is absolutely necessary. Asking for social security numbers, as well as any sensitive data, is strictly prohibited.

multiple-sendings.question-label: Do you want to allow participants to submit their profile more than once?
multiple-sendings.info: If you choose to allow multiple submissions, the participants will be able to submit their profile several times by re-entering the campaign code. Within Pix Orga you will find the latest submitted profile.

purpose.assessment-info: An assessment campaign tests participants on specific topics.
purpose.label: What is the purpose of your campaign?
purpose.profiles-collection-info: A profile collection campaign retrieves the participants’ Pix profile: their level for each competence and their pix score.

campaign-creation.target-profiles-list-label: What would you like to test?

campaign-settings.title: Settings

tooltip.aria-label: Description of a multiple sendings campaing
tooltip.text-multiple-sendings-enabled: The participants will be able to submit their profile several times by re-entering the campaign code. Within Pix Orga you will find the latest submitted profile.
tooltip.text-multiple-sendings-disabled: If the multiple submissions is activated, the participants will be able to submit their profile several times by re-entering the campaign code. Within Pix Orga the latest submitted profile will be displayed.

no-campaign.title: Create your first campaign

filter.legend: Filtres pour le tableau des campagnes, des champs de saisie permettent de filtrer le tableau par le nom de la campagne et par nom du créateur. Des boutons permettent de filtrer les campagnes actives et archivées.

login-form.active-or-retrieve: Activate or retrieve your Pix Orga space

status.403: Access to this Pix Orga space is limited to invited members. Each Pix Orga space is managed by an administrator specific to the organisation using it. Please contact your administrator to get invited.
status.401-should-change-password: An error occurred. Please change your password.

login-form.invitation-already-accepted: This invitation has already been accepted. Please log in or contact the administrator of your Pix Orga space.
login-form.invitation-was-cancelled: This invitation is no longer valid. Please contact the administrator of your Pix Orga space.
login-form.is-only-accessible: Pix Orga is only accessible to invited members. Please contact your Pix Orga administrator in order to be invited.

login-or-register.title: You have been invited to join the organisation {organizationName}

register-form.title: Sign up

cgu.aria-label: Accept the terms of use of the Pix platform
cgu.error: Please agree to the terms and conditions of use.
cgu.terms-of-use: terms and conditions of use of the Pix platform

email.error: Please enter a valid email address.
email.label: Email address

password.error: Your password must contain at least 8 characters and include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter and one number.
password.label: Password

register-form.legal-text: The information collected in this form is saved in a computer file by Pix to enable access to the service offered by Pix. They are kept for the duration of use of the service and are intended for Pix. Test results may be communicated to third parties, with your consent, if you have been invited to take a specific customised test. In accordance with the French law governing computer technology and freedoms (“Informatique et Libertés”), you can exercise the right to access and rectify your data by emailing our Data Protection Officer at dpo@pix.fr.

errors.default: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.email-already-exists: This email address is already registered, please login.

{memberFirstName} {memberLastName} will no longer have access to this Pix Orga space.
The campaigns created by this member will still be accessible to the rest of the team.
